name: RISE Research Institutes of Sweden
headAddress: RISE Research Institutes of Sweden AB
goal:
Through our international collaboration programmes with academia, industry and the public sector, we contribute to a competitive business community and a sustainable society.
RISE employees support and promote all manner of innovative processes and our testing and demonstration environments are instrumental in the process of future-proofing products, technologies and services.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Participation in Horizon 2020 research programme and other SME programmes
